p: The antiproliferative effects of F. alnus and P. harmala extracts against selected cancer cells were evaluated using the MTT test ( Table 3). There were antiproliferative effects of F. alnus and P. harmala extracts, as well as selected polyphenols, against all cancer cells. The normal cells of HEK-293 were not affected by the extracts. F. alnus showed higher antiproliferative activities than P. harmala. Noticeable antiproliferative effects were found when applying polyphenols such as quercitrin, cynaroside, trifolin, p-coumaric acid and rutoside against cancer cells.
